text: (o muham'mad!) Ila anu: "Emi? Akasala mariyu bhumi srstiki muladharudu ayina allah nu kadani nenu marevarinaina aradhyuniga cesukovala? Mariyu ayane andariki ahara mistunnadu. Mariyu ayana kevvadu ahara mivvadu." (Inka) ila anu: "Niscayanga, andari kante mundu nenu ayanaku (allah ku) vidheyudanu (muslinnu) kavalani mariyu ayanaku (allah ku) sati kalpincevarilo cerakudadani adesincabaddanu
